TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi FontDialogArray extends Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

Docs.summary: Provides a control array of controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `FontDialogArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `FontDialog` array. It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FontDialogArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FontDialogArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.ComponentModel.IContainer Container) cil managed

Docs.param: The where the control array will be hosted.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying its container.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FontDialogArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FontDialogArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

Docs.summary: Occurs when the user clicks the button in the font dialog box.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Every time the `Apply` button is clicked, another `Apply` event is raised.
For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public newslot virtual instance bool CanExtend(object target) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of a .
Docs.returns: if is a member of the control array; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Type GetControlInstanceType() cil managed

Docs.returns: The type of a control in a control array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method cannot be called from your application's code. Use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method instead.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance int16 GetIndex(class System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog o) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the index of a in a .
Docs.returns: A that represents the index of the specified .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method can be used to retrieve the index for the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog>.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

Docs.summary: Occurs when the user requests help for a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `HelpRequested` event is typically raised when the user presses the F1 key or an associated context-sensitive Help button is clicked.
For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void HookUpControlEvents(object o) cil managed

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method cannot be called from your application's code. Use `AddHandler` to hook up events for any controls that are added by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

Docs.param: A that specifies the position of an element of the control array.
Docs.summary: Gets a specific element of a by index. Read-only.
Docs.value: A at the specified in the control array.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `Item` property is the default property for a control array. Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent.
```vb# MsgBox(CStr(FontDialogArray.Item(1).Text)) MsgBox(CStr(FontDialogArray(1).Text)) ```
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void ResetIndex(class System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog o) cil managed

Docs.summary: The method is not supported in the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is not supported, and calling it does not raise an exception.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetIndex (System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog o, short Index);
.method public instance void SetIndex(class System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog o, int16 Index) cil managed

Docs.param: A that represents the index of the specified .
Docs.summary: Sets the index of the initial in a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array. To add subsequent elements, call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method and specify the `Index`.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance bool ShouldSerializeIndex(class System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog o) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether a is a member of this .
Docs.returns: if is a member of this control array; otherwise, .

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FontDialog> is a member of a different <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.FontDialogArray>, `ShouldSerializeIndex` returns `false`.
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
